Detailed Description

Implementation of the standard rm command.

Removes a file or directory myrm [OPTION] [FPATH] -r: Remove a non-empty directory and everything inside it -d: Remove a empty directory

Author:
Bishal Santra

Define Documentation

#define _GNU_SOURCE

Function Documentation

void deleteDir ( char *  dirName,
int  isRecursive 
)

deleteDir - Deletes a empty or non-empty directory

Deletes the directory mentioned in dirName. Removes all files and directories recursively with the help of nftw if the directory is not empty.

Parameters:
dirName - absolute/relative path of the directory
recursive - to delete a non-empty directory set this to 1
Returns:
void
